    • Method Detail

      • newGame

        public static ScotlandYard newGame(int numberOfDetectives,
                                   java.util.List<java.lang.Boolean> rounds,
                                   java.lang.String graphFileName)
                            throws java.io.IOException
        Constructs a new Scotland Yard game with the given parameters.
        Parameters:
        numberOfDetectives - the number of detectives playing.
        rounds - a list of booleans whose length+1 is the number of moves Mr X will make. See ScotlandYardView.getRounds() for more details.
        graphFileName - location of the graph file name.
        Returns:
        a ScotlandYard object, ready to be joined by players.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • start

        public final void start()
        Starts playing the game.

      • turn

        public final void turn()
        Performs a turn by asking the current player for their move, playing that move, and then passing priority to the next player.

        protected abstract Move getPlayerMove(Colour colour)
        Retrieves the move that the player associated to a given colour wants to make.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the move they want to make.

        Produces the list of valid moves for a given player when it is their turn.
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • spectate

        public abstract void spectate(Spectator spectator)
        Allows spectators to join the game. They can only observe as if they were a detective: only MrX's revealed locations can be seen.
        Parameters:
        spectator - the spectator that wants to be notified when a move is made.

      • join

        public abstract boolean join(Player player,
                             Colour colour,
                             int location,
                             java.util.Map<Ticket,java.lang.Integer> tickets)
        Allows players to join the game with a given starting state. When the last player has joined, the game must ensure that the first player to play is Mr X.
        Parameters:
        player - player that wants to be notified when he must make moves
        colour - colour of the player
        location - starting location of the player
        tickets - starting tickets for that player
        Returns:
